# nGantt

nGantt is totally free. Feel free to use it, modify it and distribute it.
nGantt is a WPF user control written in C#. Even though it currently is in its early stages it is pretty flexible and has the most common gantt control features. nGantt is based on .Net Framework 4

Here are some features
* Dynamic and flexible timelines 
* Support for multiple timelines
* Vertical gridlines (attachable to timeline)
* 3 types of RowGroups (non headerd, headerd and expandable)
* Multiple GanttTasks on every GanttRow
* Different GanttTask selection modes
* GanttTask progressbar indicator (definable per task)
* Mouse selectable area for "new GanttTask" type of behavior with owner defined context menu
* Owner defined context menu for GanttTasks
And more...

I'll continue to post updates and here are some things I have plans to add to nGantt 
* Support for milestone indicators
* "Snap to grid" functionality for selection (with "snap accuracy")
* Better support for layout customization (useful when hosting in WinForms applications)
Next version, will include some of the above mentioned features, will be available at the beginning of October 2012. 

![nGantt](http://cloud.github.com/downloads/danwallentin/nGantt/nGantt.jpg)

Feedback on nGantt is appreciated and questions can be sent to
dan.wallentin@gmail.com
